text: Members of the Tamil Nadu Government Employees’ Association blocking State Bank Road in the city on Friday seeking fulfilment of their 20 demands for which they are on indefinite strike from Wednesday. As many as 1,530 government employees including 1,300 women were arrested by the police for picketing the Collectorate and blocking the road. The arrested were released in the evening. The road blockade affected traffic from Lanka Corner to Police Commissioner’s office for more than three hours till 1 p.m.— Photo: M. Periasamy
title: To press demands
